Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Risk factors associated with the development of torsades de pointes were the appearance of an U wave ( p = 0 . 049 ) , female gender ( p = 0 . 015 ) , and significant dose - corrected changes of SCL , QT interval , and QTc interval ( p < 0 . 05 ) .

Let's think step by step.

```
| Disease |
| --- |
| torsades de pointes |
| U wave |
| SCL |
| QT interval |
| QTc interval |
```
Note: "SCL" and "QT interval" are not diseases, but rather electrocardiogram (ECG) parameters that can be affected by certain diseases or conditions. "QTc interval" is a corrected version of the QT interval that takes into account the heart rate.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

I apologize for my mistake. Here are the valid entities that clearly refer to "Disease" in the given paragraph:

| Disease |
| --- |
| torsades de pointes |
| U wave |

The other entities mentioned in the paragraph, such as "SCL", "QT interval", and "QTc interval", do not clearly refer to diseases and have been excluded from the table.
